title: Help can't Even get on my league app on my computer
body: Need so much help i kept redownloading league but it only works for one game per redownload {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: Can you provide some more details, error messages, or screenshots of the issue you are experiencing?  I look forward to your follow-up and helping you out!
What happens when you try to play a second time?
